## extractors variable

Content processing and extraction utilities.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
extractors: {
  summary: (
    wordsMap: import('./types').WordUsageMapType,
    floor?: number,
    max?: number,
  ) => import('./types').SummaryRecordType
  words: (body: string, stopWords?: string[], locales?: string | string[]) =>
    import('./types').WordUsageMapType
}
```
